references.paper_title: CryoDRGN: reconstruction of heterogeneous cryo-EM structures using neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduces CryoDRGN, a neural network-based method for cryo-EM reconstruction, which is directly compared to and built upon in the current work.

references.paper_title: cryoSPARC: algorithms for rapid unsupervised cryo-EM structure determination
references.reason: This paper introduces cryoSPARC, a widely used software for cryo-EM reconstruction that serves as a key baseline and comparison point for the presented method.

references.paper_title: CryoAI: Amortized inference of poses for ab initio reconstruction of 3D molecular volumes from real cryo-EM images
references.reason: This paper introduces cryoAI, a state-of-the-art method that uses amortized inference for pose estimation in cryo-EM, which is directly compared to and improved upon in this work.

references.paper_title: CryoPoseNet: End-to-end simultaneous learning of single-particle orientation and 3D map reconstruction from cryo-electron microscopy data
references.reason: This paper introduces cryoPoseNet, another significant method for cryo-EM reconstruction which leverages deep learning for pose prediction and is compared against the current work.

references.paper_title: A Bayesian view on cryo-EM structure determination
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational Bayesian framework for cryo-EM structure determination, which is relevant to the theoretical underpinnings of many modern approaches, including the one proposed in this work.
